title: 装了个神秘时代3.0.3C汉化版就崩溃了 求高手帮忙看看
author: qq3032230
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Exception in server tick loop

A full error report has been saved to E:\MC不科学\Minecraft1.4.7\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-03-17_21.35.24-server.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(
